Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Sweetie
Reviews.Content: I placed the new outdoor TV over my hottub and it is great. I can sit in rain snow or sleet and be warm and watch a football game or series. It was easy to get placed and the picture is great. I did order extra remotes because I assume the original will get dropped in tub.

ProductInfo.Features:
Bright 55-in 1,920 x 1080 Full-HD LED display for improved outdoor viewing
ASA Outdoor Rated High-Impact Resin housing protects internal components from weathering effects such as rain, humidity and dust
Multi-fan airflow system keeps unit cool and dry in temperatures up to 122 Degrees F
Capable of operating in temperatures as cold as -24 Degrees F
Innovative water-tight cable entry system seals out moisture and dust while allowing for easy hook-ups
ProductInfo.Name: SunBriteTV SB-5560HD-SL-R Signature Series 55 in. 1080p 60 Hz LED Full-HD True Outdoor All-Weather TV (Silver)
